titles: An elogy upon that never to be forgotten matron, old Maddam Gwinn, who was unfortunately drown'd in her own fishpond, on the 29th of July 1679.
notes: Verse: "Mourners prepare, let doleful ecchoes sound ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Gwyn, Helena, d. 1679 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
